news.title: Kraft Heinz taps former Kellanova CEO Steve Cahillane to lead company ahead of breakup
news.summary: Steve Cahillane previously led Kellogg through its own breakup two years ago. He was named CEO of Kellogg's parent company, Kellogg Co, in 2011.

news.title: Consumers are feeling gloomy about the economy. Here's why they're spending anyway
news.summary: Consumer sentiment is low and the job market is shaky. Shoppers are still spending during the holidays. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a slow rate this year.

news.title: Robotaxis in 2025: Waymo plots global expansion as Zoox, Tesla roll to the starting line
news.summary: Waymo, Zoox and Tesla will all launch autonomous rides by 2025. Zoox will debut public rides, while Tesla will launch with human supervision.

news.title: U.S. halts UK tech trade deal negotiations, FT reports
news.summary: The 'technology prosperity deal' is aimed at increasing collaboration between the countries on tech like AI, nuclear fusion and quantum. The deal is expected to be in place by the end of the year.

news.title: Ford to record $19.5 billion in special charges related to EV pullback
news.summary: The charges are related to a restructuring of its business priorities and a pullback in its all-electric vehicle investments, Ford announced Monday. Ford says it will also be reducing the number of vehicles it plans to build.

news.title: Dow Transports are stock-market leaders now. Here’s what that means for investors.
news.summary: The Dow Transportation index is considered a bellwether for the broad market. But that might be overstating things. The index is down 2.7% this year.

news.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
news.summary: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one,” she said of her ex-husband.

news.title: There’s one way to hold crypto in your 401(k) right now — but you’ll be on your own
news.summary: Crypto is on a path to inclusion in retirement plans — if it can get past company plan sponsors. Crypto is a form of digital money that can be used to transfer money between accounts.

news.title: Big Tech stocks are getting cheaper, and that could mean gains of up to 60%
news.summary: S&P 500 stocks may be expensive relative to their historical averages, but many are cheaper than they were at the start of the quarter.

news.title: Fund managers hold record low in cash as sentiment hits four-year high
news.summary: Bank of America’s chief investment strategist says the survey is the most bullish fund manager survey in the last 3.5 years. The survey was carried out by fund managers across the U.S. and Europe.
